passages.text:
Hi, I am here to teach you how to effectively operate your Navi.

[[Continue -> Tutorial (2)]]
passages.name: Tutorial (1)

passages.text:
Would you like to learn more?

[[Yes -> Tutorial (3a)]]
[[No -> Tutorial (3b)]]
passages.name: Tutorial (2)

passages.text:
You can bring up a list of controls in the Menu.

[[Continue -> Tutorial (3b)]]
passages.name: Tutorial (3a)

passages.text: Thats all then, come talk to me again if you want any tips.
passages.name: Tutorial (3b)
